Song: meenammA meenammA

Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d1 n3 S

meenammA meenammA kaNgaL meenammA

sugamAna oru rAgam uruvAhum nEram nANamO

idhamAga sugam kANa thuNai vENdAmO

Stanza 1:
singam ondru nEril vandhu rAjanadai pOduthu thangamagan thEril vandhAl kOdi minnal soozhudhE
pR R   S  n  S S   S  S   pRR S n   S S S   pR  R S n   S  n   d  pdm  p d  nSnd   np p  p

muTHai aLLi veesi ingu viTHai seiyum poongodi thaTHiTHaTHiTHAvi vandhu kaiyil ennai yEndhadi
pR R   S n  S S   S S  pRR    S  n   S   S S  pR R  S  n  S  n  d  pdm p  d   nSnd  np p  p

mOgam koNda manmadhanum pookaNaigaL pOdavE  kAyam patta kALai nenjil kAman kaNai mooduthE
p n2  n2 n2 n2 n2n2 SR  n2RS n2 d2  n2d2pdm mdd   d  d  d d   d  pdn nSn   d p   p  p p

mandhirangaL kAdhil sollum indhiranin jAlamO  chandhirargaL sooriyargaL pOvathenna mAyamO
p  n2 n2 n2  n2 n2  n2 SR  n2RS n2d2  n2d2pdm md  d  d  d   d  d d  pdn nSn d   p  p p p

(sugamAna)
(meenammA)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
itta adi nOgumammA poovai aLLi thoovungaL mottu udal vadumammA pattu methai pOdungaL
sangathamiz kALai ivan piLLaiTHamiz pEsungaL sandhanaTHai thotteduthu nenjil konjam poosungaL
poonjaraTHil thotil katti lAlilali koorungaL nenjamennum manjamathil nAn iNaya vAzthungaL
paLLiyarai nEramidhu thaLLi nindru pAdungaL solli tharathevai illai poongathavai moodungaL
(sugamAna)
(meenammA)
